traits.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: Shariel's weapon attacks are magical. When the deva hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra {@dice 4d8} radiant damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Shariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Mace
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: Shariel touches another creature. The target magically regains 20 ({@dice 4d8 + 2}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

actions.name: Change Shape
entries: Shariel magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.
